Description.Text:
Position The Galata hotel located in the heart of the historic center of Genoa, welcomes its guests in a pleasant and intimate atmosphere, perfect for a short stay or a holiday or a business trip in all seasons.
Restaurant
Outside
Lobby
More Informations This suggests, among other things, a rooftop terrace, a library, and multilingual staff.
Agreement with garage parking 200 metres from the hotel, 21 euros per day.
